title: If you are using a Mac, you can significantly speed up the transfer of data (approximately 10 times faster) by using TurboTransfer software
Extensions need to be stored in the Extensions folder in order to be available to the Macintosh. Put “TurboTransfer 1.x

note: within the System folder) onto the desktop and restart the computer.
title: Click the “OK” button and restart the computer with the AlphaSmart disconnected in order to load the extension. Now you are ready to download at turbo speeds! To deactivate this extension, simply drag it out of the Extensions folder
